attributes.title: Horrendous
attributes.review: I downloaded this app, and then I proceeded to vomit. The horrible icon, user interface, and poisonous message that this app is trying to convey are all so horrendously toxic that I had to say something. That something is this: take the app down. attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!
attributes.review:
This app is the absolute worst app anyone could ever wish for. I thought that I was going to get information about a non-racist, non-homophobic and not sexist president. But the app is actually about Donald Trump, who is, well, a disgusting human being. So do not download this app under ANY circumstances. 

Thank you.
